app.title: DRONA
app.subtitle: Defence Ready Operations for Networked Aircrafts
app.motto: Protecting the skies, one signal at a time.

dashboard.title: Aircraft Health Monitoring
dashboard.heroSubtitle: Drona uses advanced AI algorithms to predict potential faults in aircraft, ensuring safety and reducing downtime.
dashboard.keyFeaturesDescription: Drona offers a comprehensive suite of features designed to enhance aircraft maintenance and operational efficiency.

enhancedSafety.title: Enhanced Safety
enhancedSafety.description: Predictive maintenance minimizes the risk of in-flight failures, ensuring the highest safety standards.

reducedDowntime.title: Reduced Downtime
reducedDowntime.description: AI-driven insights allow for proactive maintenance, significantly reducing aircraft downtime.

costSavings.title: Cost Savings
costSavings.description: By preventing unexpected repairs and optimizing maintenance schedules, Drona helps lower operational costs.

features.title: Advanced Features for Aircraft Maintenance
features.subtitle: Discover the comprehensive suite of AI-powered features that make DRONA the leading solution for predictive aircraft maintenance.

aiPredictive.title: AI-Powered Predictive Analytics
aiPredictive.description: Advanced machine learning algorithms analyze aircraft data to predict maintenance needs before failures occur.

threatDetection.title: Real-Time Threat Detection
threatDetection.description: Continuous monitoring of aircraft systems to identify potential security threats and anomalies.

healthMonitoring.title: Health Monitoring Dashboard
healthMonitoring.description: Comprehensive real-time visualization of aircraft health metrics and system performance.

networkMapping.title: Network Mapping & Tracking
networkMapping.description: Advanced radar-style network visualization for tracking aircraft positions and status.

dataIntegration.title: Data Integration Hub
dataIntegration.description: Seamless integration with existing aircraft systems and databases for comprehensive data analysis.

instantDiagnostics.title: Instant Diagnostics
instantDiagnostics.description: Lightning-fast diagnostic capabilities powered by our proprietary AI chip technology.

anomalyDetection.title: Anomaly Detection
anomalyDetection.description: Advanced pattern recognition to identify unusual behavior patterns in aircraft systems.

cloudNative.title: Cloud-Native Architecture
cloudNative.description: Scalable cloud infrastructure ensuring high availability and performance.

contact.title: Get in Touch
contact.subtitle: Ready to revolutionize your aircraft maintenance? Contact our team of experts to learn how DRONA can enhance your operations.

form.title: Send us a Message
form.description: Fill out the form below and we'll get back to you within 24 hours.
form.messagePlaceholder: Tell us about your aircraft maintenance needs...

reports.title: Aircraft Diagnostic Report
reports.footer: This report is generated by DRONA - Defence Ready Operations for Networked Aircrafts
reports.generateDescription: Generate a comprehensive diagnostic report for {{callsign}}

summary.title: AI Analysis Summary
summary.description: Advanced machine learning algorithms continuously analyze aircraft data to provide predictive insights and recommendations.

predictions.engineMaintenanceDesc: Predictive analysis indicates engine components will require maintenance within 72 hours based on current performance metrics.

anomalies.temperatureSpikeDesc: Unusual temperature patterns detected in avionics bay. Recommend immediate inspection.

optimizations.fuelEfficiencyDesc: Route optimization could improve fuel efficiency by 12% while maintaining current schedule.

alerts.systemCheckDesc: Automated system health check completed successfully. All systems operating within normal parameters.
